toast.clipboardNotSupported: Clipboard not supported, please download instead
toast.imageCopyNotSupported: Image copy not supported, please download instead

defaults.markdown:
# Markdown2Image

Convert Markdown into beautiful images, share to social media with one click.

## Highlights

- **Live Preview** — See the final result as you edit
- **Rich Backgrounds** — 40+ gradients / solid colors / custom images
- **Shadow & Texture** — Multiple box-shadow and overlay effects
- **Template System** — Switch preset typography styles with one click
- **One-Click Export** — Download PNG or copy to clipboard

## Code Example

```javascript
function hello(name) {
  console.log(`Hello, ${name}!`);
}

hello('World');
```

> "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." — Leonardo da Vinci

---

*Click the card to enter edit mode*

hero.tagline: Built for creators and media teams
hero.subtitle: Turn Markdown into stunning visual cards. 40+ gradient backgrounds, 10+ typography templates, one-click HD PNG export.
hero.noSignUp: No sign-up required, free to use

painPoints.label: Pain Points
painPoints.title: Facing these challenges?
painPoints.subtitle: We identified the most common obstacles in content creation and built instant solutions.
painPoints.p1Desc: Information gets overlooked. You need visually striking content to boost engagement and reach.
painPoints.p2Desc: Manually adjusting fonts, spacing, and colors is painful — starting from scratch every time.
painPoints.p3Desc: Manual screenshots are blurry and inconsistent, reducing quality on social media.
painPoints.p4Desc: Every image looks different, lacking brand consistency and professional appearance.

features.label: Features
features.title: What can Md2Img do for you?
features.subtitle: Full support from content creation to sharing.
features.f1Desc: WYSIWYG editing — zero gap between writing and preview.
features.f2Desc: Gradients, solid colors, custom images — browse by category.
features.f3Desc: 12 shadow presets + 12 texture overlays for premium quality.
features.f4Desc: Quote, Excerpt, Memo, Noir... switch preset styles instantly.
features.f5Desc: Add, switch, delete cards — manage like an artboard.
features.f6Desc: 2x resolution PNG export, or copy directly to clipboard.

testimonials.title: Why users choose Md2Img
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from users across industries

row1.name: Lin Yi
row1.text: Converting Markdown to images is so convenient. A manuscript becomes a beautiful card in minutes, with one-click background switching.

row1.name: Zhou Heng
row1.text: The template system saves our team tons of time. Brand colors and fonts applied in one click, more consistent output.

row1.name: Yuki
row1.text: Beautiful gradients, friendly typography, exports ready for all social platforms.

row1.name: Chen Xiao
row1.text: Template duplication across projects is amazing. Visual consistency achieved quickly for campaigns.

row1.name: Aiden
row1.text: I use the memo template for knowledge cards. HD export is perfect for classroom sharing.

row1.name: Wang Qi
row1.text: Batch-generate product highlight cards. Marketing materials ready in a day, efficiency doubled.

row1.name: Li Ming
row1.text: The shadow and texture system is brilliant. Card quality far exceeds other tools.

row1.name: Zhang Wei
row1.text: Multi-card management is very practical. Create a series at once, standardized output.

row2.name: Emma
row2.text: So much smoother than other tools. Campaign poster efficiency doubled.

row2.name: Liu Yang
row2.text: Fine-tuned corners and shadows. Card quality surpasses similar products.

row2.name: Alex
row2.text: Rich template library. Finding the right one for any scenario saves massive design costs.

row2.name: Zhao Ya
row2.text: HD export is powerful. Print quality is great too, students love it.

row2.name: Mark
row2.text: Open source and free. High code quality, integrates smoothly into my workflow.

row2.name: Sun Li
row2.text: Quick image generation in emergencies. My boss praises the efficiency.

row2.name: David
row2.text: Professional color combinations. Even non-designers create tasteful work.

row2.name: Chen Chen
row2.text: Making note-sharing cards for class. Classmates love them — write in Markdown, generate in one click.

showcase.title: Showcase Gallery
showcase.subtitle: Card examples with different backgrounds and typography styles

items.a: Yes, Md2Img is completely free and open source. All features, templates, and background themes are unlimited, no sign-up required.
Full GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) syntax, including headings, lists, bold, italic, links, images, code blocks, tables, task lists, strikethrough, and more.
Exports at 2x pixel ratio in PNG format by default, ensuring crisp display on high-resolution screens. For example, a 540px card exports as a 1080px image.

items.q: Can I use custom background images?
items.a: Yes. Click "Upload Background" in the background panel to use a local image as card background. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, and other common formats.

items.q: Does it support code syntax highlighting?
items.a: Yes. Powered by Prism highlighting engine, supporting JavaScript, Python, Go, Rust, and dozens of other languages, with automatic light/dark code theme switching.
Completely safe. All editing and exporting happens locally in your browser — nothing is uploaded to any server. Your content stays on your device.

cta.subtitle: You've discovered the power of Md2Img. Don't hesitate — create your first card and bring your ideas to life!

footer.desc: Turn Markdown into stunning visual cards. Free, open source, privacy-first.
footer.copyright: © {{year}} Md2Img. Open source, runs locally, data stays safe.
